messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Are all tools made equal? (from a  sadder-but-wiser girl)
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Tia.  Your right about my kids.  As I move through this process, it is easy to understand now, that my kids have been trying to teach me for so long.
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Tia. Your right about my kids. As I move through this process, it is easy to understand now, that my kids have been trying to teach me for so long. I'm so glad I have finally started to hear them.

Pat

----- Original Message -----
From: Tia Leschke
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, January 30, 2002 7:21 PM
Subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Are all tools made equal? (from a sadder-but-wiser girl)



>
>
>I'm intending to become an experienced unschooler can I play?

If it were up to me you could. <g> I've thoroughly enjoyed watching your
process on the other list. (Your kids are good "teachers")
Tia

No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Eleanor Roosevelt
